Stash:

Equip:
Equip (if able)

Equip:
Equip (if able)

Stash:
If there are no defeated {{icon_monster:small}} on the weapon, you may discard it to the {{icon_stash:small}} to restore up to 3{{icon_stamina:small}}

name: Sun'Li
text:
Sacrifice:
If Sun’Li has not defeated any {{icon_monster:small}}, you may discard Sun’Li to the ✟ and lose 4{{icon_life:small}} less after you have fought a {{icon_monster:small}}

name: Durgen
text:
Sacrifice:
If Durgen has not defeated any {{icon_monster:small}}, you may discard Durgen to the ✟ and lose 6{{icon_life:small}} less after you have fought a {{icon_monster:small}}

name: The Giant's Stone
text:
Equip:
Equip to wield its power.

ACTIVE:
When equipped, whenever you would lose {{icon_life:small}} from fighting a {{icon_monster:small}}, you may roll {{icon_artifact:small}} and lose that amount less.
flavor: "This is what I came for"

name: Take A Rest
text:
Rest:
Discard to the ✟ to restore up to 2{{icon_stamina:small}} and up to 2{{icon_life:small}}

name: Search The Stash
text:
Search:
Discard to the ✟ to search the {{icon_stash:small}} and use one of the cards again.

name: Potion of Life
text:
Consume:
Discard to the {{icon_stash:small}} to restore up to 2{{icon_life:small}}

name: Potion of Life
text:
Consume:
Discard to the {{icon_stash:small}} to restore up to 3{{icon_life:small}}

name: Potion of Life
text:
Consume:
Discard to the {{icon_stash:small}} to restore up to 4{{icon_life:small}}

name: Potion of Life
text:
Consume:
Discard to the {{icon_stash:small}} to restore up to 5{{icon_life:small}}

name: Potion of Life
text:
Consume:
Discard to the {{icon_stash:small}} to restore up to 6{{icon_life:small}}

name: Broken Door
text:
ACTIVE:
You can not flee while this obstacle is in the ☖

Break:
You may discard this obstacle to the ✟
flavor: "A dungeon crawling with terrible monsters, and *this* is what holds me back..."

name: Barred Gate
text:
ACTIVE:
You can not flee while this obstacle is in the ☖

Break:
You may spend 1{{icon_stamina:small}} or 1{{icon_life:small}} to discard this obstacle to the ✟
flavor: "I will tear down anything in my way!"

name: Barricade
text:
ACTIVE:
You can not flee while this obstacle is in the ☖

Break:
You may spend 1{{icon_stamina:small}} or 1{{icon_life:small}} to discard this obstacle to the ✟
flavor: "I wonder who put this up..."

name: The Giant's Blow
text:
ACTIVE:
After fighting a {{icon_monster:small}}, roll for success:

• If the roll succeeds, the {{icon_monster:small}} is defeated.
• If the roll fails, you may spend 1{{icon_stamina:small}} to re-roll once. Otherwise the {{icon_monster:small}} is undefeated and must be shuffled into the {{icon_dungeon:small}}

When resolved: you are no longer afflicted by the Giant's Blow. Put the card away.
flavor: "Ugh, that giant got me good..."

name: Spikes
text:
ENCOUNTER:
Discard to the ✟, then roll for success:

If the roll fails, you lose 2{{icon_life:small}}
flavor: "Just one wrong step..."

name: Dark Pit
text:
ENCOUNTER:
Discard to the ✟, then roll for success:

If the roll fails, you lose 2{{icon_life:small}}
flavor: "It does not appear to have a bottom..."

name: Rat
text:
UNDEFEATED:
The Rat bites you as it quickly scurries away; you lose 1{{icon_life:small}}
flavor: "I should have stomped the nastiness out of it when I had the chance..."

name: Spider
text:
ENCOUNTER:
If you are afflicted by the Giant's Blow, the Spider bites you; you lose 2{{icon_life:small}}
flavor: "I'm trapped in this God forsaken hellhole, yet these things seem to find their way in and out as they please..."

name: Zombie
text:
ACTIVE:
If the Zombie is at (or would go to) the top of the ✟, it becomes undefeated; shuffle the Zombie into the {{icon_dungeon:small}}
flavor: "Usually it just takes a good blow to the head..."

name: Skeleton
flavor: "No rest for anyone in this wicked place, it seems..."

name: Frenzied Zombie
text:
ACTIVE:
If the Zombie is at (or would go to) the top of the ✟, it becomes undefeated; shuffle the Zombie into the {{icon_dungeon:small}}
flavor: "Argh! How DO you kill these dreadful creatures?!"

name: Charging Skeleton
text:
DEFEATED:
If a Skeleton (5) is in the ☖ or at the top of the ✟, you must fight that Skeleton immediately.
flavor: "Looks like he brought a friend..."

name: Goblin
text:
ENCOUNTER:
If the {{icon_artifact:small}} is not hidden in the {{icon_dungeon:small}}, the Goblin steals the {{icon_artifact:small}} and becomes undefeated.

Draw a new card, then shuffle both the {{icon_artifact:small}} and the Goblin back into the {{icon_dungeon:small}}
flavor: "Did I just get robbed?"

name: Goblin
text:
ENCOUNTER:
If the {{icon_artifact:small}} is not hidden in the {{icon_dungeon:small}}, the Goblin steals the {{icon_artifact:small}} and becomes undefeated.

Draw a new card, then shuffle both the {{icon_artifact:small}} and the Goblin back into the {{icon_dungeon:small}}
flavor: "Hey, you! You come back here!"

name: Ghostly Presence
text:
ENCOUNTER:
The Ghostly Presence takes another form.

Shuffle the ✟

If the card on top of the ✟ reveals a {{icon_monster:small}}, that {{icon_monster:small}} replaces the Ghostly Presence.
flavor: "What was that?"

name: Haunting Vision
text:
ACTIVE:
While the Haunting Vision is in the ☖, you may not use any ability that requires {{icon_stamina:small}}
flavor: "Burdened and encumbered… And i’m not even carrying anything!"

name: Goblin
text:
ENCOUNTER:
If the {{icon_artifact:small}} is not hidden in the {{icon_dungeon:small}}, the Goblin steals the {{icon_artifact:small}} and becomes undefeated.

Draw a new card, then shuffle both the {{icon_artifact:small}} and the Goblin back into the {{icon_dungeon:small}}
flavor: "You! You again!? That is MY treasure!"

name: Shadow
text:
ACTIVE:
While the Shadow is in the ☖, any {{icon_stamina:small}} spent must be doubled.

DEFEATED:
You may restore up to 2{{icon_stamina:small}}
flavor: "My mind... My thoughts… Everything feels so heavy..."

name: Lich
text:
ACTIVE:
While the Lich is in the ☖, whenever you spend any {{icon_stamina:small}}, you also lose that much {{icon_life:small}}
flavor: "Something about its presence is draining all my energy"

name: Cave Spider
flavor: "Looks like this one won’t fit under my boot..."

name: Cave Troll
text:
ENCOUNTER:
Carelessly, the giant swings its weapon.

Shuffle any adjacent cards into the {{icon_dungeon:small}}, then draw back that many cards.
flavor: "Phew! Thank the Gods I dodged that! Monsters should not be allowed wielding such huge weapons..."

name: Ogre
text:
DEFEATED:
You were knocked to the ground.

Take the Giant's Blow card.

name: Urgthak¹
text:
ENCOUNTER:
The giant awakens.

Put Urgthak¹ away.

Draw a new card, then find and shuffle Urghtak² into the {{icon_dungeon:small}}

name: Urgthak²
text:
ENCOUNTER:
The giant roars in anger.

You are knocked to the ground.

Take the Giant's Blow card, then put Urgthak² away.

Draw a new card, then find and shuffle Urghtak³ into the {{icon_dungeon:small}}

name: Urgthak³
text:
ENCOUNTER:
The giant swings at you with all his might.

You are knocked to the ground.

You lose 2{{icon_life:small}}

Take the Giant's Blow card.

name: Borak
text:
ENCOUNTER:
You tremble at the sight of the chieftain.

You lose 1{{icon_life:small}}

Borak becomes undefeated.

Draw a new card, then shuffle Borak back into the {{icon_dungeon:small}}

name: Hizeldur
text:
ACTIVE:
You can not flee from Hizeldur

ACTIVE:
Whenever you remove a card from the ☖, place 1{{icon_stamina:small}} on Hizeldur. If you can't, place 1{{icon_life:small}} instead.

When there are 3 {{icon_stamina:small}}/{{icon_life:small}} on Hizeldur, discard them and shuffle all cards in the ☖ (including Hizeldur) into the {{icon_dungeon:small}}, then draw back that many cards.

name: Zul
text:
ENCOUNTER:
A {{icon_monster:small}} rises from the dead.

Shuffle the ✟

From the top of the ✟, find the first {{icon_monster:small}} and shuffle it into the {{icon_dungeon:small}}

name: Bakwak
text:
ACTIVE:
Whenever a {{icon_monster:small}} is defeated, Bakwak grows stronger. Place 1{{icon_life:small}} on .

Bakwak has 1 additional toughness for each {{icon_life:small}} placed on him.

UNDEFEATED:
Bakwak strikes; you lose 1{{icon_life:small}}

Discard any {{icon_life:small}} on Bakwak.

name: Garzuk
text:
ENCOUNTER:
Garzuk steals everything he can get his filthy little hands on.

If there are any beneficial cards in the ☖, Garzuk becomes undefeated.

Remove Garzuk and any beneficial cards from the ☖, then draw back that many cards. Finally shuffle the removed cards into the {{icon_dungeon:small}}
